Highlights

  • Argument Mining. ACL workshop on argumentative structure identification. More events...
  • Conversational Search. Dagstuhl seminar on interactive search technology. More events...
  • Hyperpartisan News Detection. SemEval task on one-sided news detection. More events...
  • PAN. Excellence network and evaluation lab on text forensics. More events...
  • TIRA. Science 2.0 experimentation platform for shared tasks. More research...
  • Digital Bauhaus Lab. Center for innovative research. More facilities...
  • Lecturenotes. Comprehensive and open repository of the Webis teaching material.
